content: *from the website * this double-thick scrubber works well in the kitchen but can also be used to scrub fiberglass tubs cars etc worked in one piece it has a nylon scrubber side and a cotton side this pattern uses helena s potholder stitch 1 to make a thick spongy material *materials * - about 2 oz each of worsted weight cotton yarn and needleloft 100% nylon plastic canvas yarn 1 http //web archive org/web/20011031054408/www spotfans com/unplugged/spotfans/archives/980113/cheryl/potholder html
